review: I bought this on a whim when it was on sale, and I'm so glad I did.  I'm by no means a pro when it comes to tech-y stuff, but it was easy to install and set up by myself (plugs into the HDMI port on the TV and into a wall outlet).  It arrived already connected to my Amazon Prime account, so I could go right to the Amazon Instant Video section and see my Watch list.  I mostly use it to watch Netflix and listen to Spotify, but there are so many other apps you can download, like games, YouTube, Hulu, Pandora, etc.  It comes with a slim little remote, and you can also download a free app on your phone, so you can use your phone as a remote, which is awesome if you misplace the remote itself and are too lazy to look for it, haha.  I use the Fire Stick every single day and have never had any problems with connectivity, lagging, etc.  It's definitely my most-used Amazon purchase, and I love it!
